content:
Discover An Enchanting Destination To Make Memories

Let the magic of the islands light up your child's eyes - and put a smile on your face.

Whether you're marveling at your first Florida Keys sunset or watching playful dolphins leap across crystal blue water, this is one family vacation you'll never forget. With spacious guest rooms, The Marker is perfect for your next Key West family vacation. Relax on private porches or splash in oasis pools. Explore historic downtown and the adjacent Key West Seaport for fun-filled activities and attractions everyone will enjoy.

Nearby Attractions:

 

  • Key West Aquarium
  • Dolphin Watching
  • Conch Tour Train
  • Key West Shipwreck Museum
  • Hemingway Home & Museum
  • Mel Fisher Maritime Heritage Society & Museum
  • Key West Butterfly & Nature Conservatory
  • Florida Keys Eco-Discovery Center
  • Historic Seaport

Explore our area guide for more things to do on your Key West vacation.
